languageKey.label: T3S Install-Tool
T3S Extension Name:
Create your own T3S-Distribution!
T3S Install-Tool
[C. Or...] Select a T3S-Distribution from your Server (Select A,B or C!)
[A. Or...] Select a T3S-Distribution (Select A,B or C!)
The Htaccess File is not writeable, 'cos you haven't a Apache2Handler ModRewrite Configuration!
The Install Tool is locked! Fix: Remove file typo3conf/DISABLE_T3S_INSTALL_TOOL. This file may simply be empty.
ImageMagick/ImageGrafix is NOT installed? Please set the Path in the Typo3-Install-Tool!
The folder "typo3/typo3conf/" is NOT writeable!
The folder "typo3/typo3conf/ext/" is NOT writeable!
NO connection to the Typo3-Extension-Repository!
The folder "typo3/typo3temp/" is NOT writeable!
[B. Or...] Fetch a T3S-Distribution from the Extension Repository (Select A,B or C!)
Install the selected T3S-Distribution
Start Installation
Are you really like to install the T3S-Distribution?
The folder "typo3/fileadmin/" is NOT writeable!
SQL anlegen:
The T3S Install-Distribution configurates the database! This executes SQL!
You have NO empty Typo3-Dummy-Package! You have more than 1 Extension in Typo3conf! The Install-Tool can overwrite one of these Extensions!
Write the ".htaccess" file for the RealUrl-Extension in the "/typo3" folder.
Import files and folders from the Install-Distribution and write it in to the "typo3/fileadmin/".
Import files and folders from the Install-Distribution and write it into the "typo3/fileadmin/".
Download this from the Extension Repository
Download this Extensions from the Typo3-Extension-Repository.
t3sSubmitInstall
In the next Step you can see all the tasks for the installation...
t3sSubmitInstall
Install the selected T3S-Distribution
Run the T3S-Installation
Retrieve/Update the Extension-List
Connection to the Typo3-Extension-Repository!
